title: Boston African American National Historic Site: The Boston Middle Passage Project
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     History & Culture     The Boston Middle Passage Project              The Boston Middle Passage Project         The Boston Middle Passage Remembrance Ceremony held at Faneuil Hall on August 23, 2015. Boston National Historical Park  Boston African American National Historic Site is proud to work alongside a number of local and national organizations as part of the Boston Middle Passage Project.    On August 23rd, 2015, the site cosponsored the Boston Middle Passage Remembrance Ceremony at Faneuil Hall. To learn more about this project and to see videos from the ceremony, please visit the website which can be found here.
